titles.title: Protecting Veteran Community Care Act
Protecting Veteran Community Care Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to expand access to the Veterans Community Care Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs to include certain veterans seeking mental health or substance-use services and toxic-exposed veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Protecting Veteran Community Care Act
This bill modifies the community care program for veterans, including to expand access to community mental health care providers.
